name: Sleeping Snorlax
Dialogue: A sleeping POKEMON blocks the way!

name: Wake up Snorlax
Dialogue: A sleeping POKEMON blocks the way!
Player played the POKE FLUTE.
SNORLAX woke up!
It attacked in a grumpy rage!

name: Defeat Snorlax
Dialogue: SNORLAX calmed down! With a big yawn, it returned to the mountains!
There's a lookout spot upstairs.

My POKEMON's ashes are stored in POKEMON TOWER. You can have this
TM. I don't need it any more...
You don't have room for this.

TM39 is a move called SWIFT. It's very accurate, so use it during
battles you can't afford to lose.

name: 2 after
Dialogue:
TM39 is a move called SWIFT. It's very accurate, so use it during
battles you can't afford to lose.

I'm the FISHING GURU's brother! I simply Looove fishing!
Do you like to fish!
Oh... That's so disappointing...
Grand! I like your style! Take this and fish, young one!

name: 3 after
Dialogue:
Fishing is a way of life! From the seas to rivers, go out and
land the big one!

name: Trainer 1
Dialogue: Yeah! I got a bite, here!

name: Trainer 1 after
Dialogue: Hang on! My line's snagged!

name: Trainer 2
Dialogue: Be patient! Fishing is a waiting game!

name: Trainer 2 after
Dialogue: With a better ROD, I could catch better POKEMON!

name: Trainer 3
Dialogue: The FISHING FOOL vs. POKEMON KID!

name: Trainer 3 after
Dialogue: You beat me at POKEMON, but I'm good at fishing!

name: Trainer 4
Dialogue: I'd rather be working!

name: Trainer 4 after
Dialogue: It's all right. Losing doesn't bud me any more.

name: Trainer 5
Dialogue: Electricity is my specialty!

name: Trainer 5 after
Dialogue: Water conducts electricity, so you should zap sea POKEMON!

name: Trainer 6
Dialogue: You never know what you could catch!

name: Trainer 6 after
Dialogue: I catch MAGIKARP all the time, but they're so weak!

name: Trainer 7
Dialogue: Have you found a MOON STONE?

name: Trainer 7 after
Dialogue: I could have made my POKEMON evolve with MOON STONE!
